comments.body: Can you add a test that uses closureâ€™s * type in interesting ways? Eg (1) at the beginning of line (2) following an asterisk at beginning of line.

In 64bbf5ee125b44a55cbe8efda60182ec20d815be I added tests that demonstrate that this `@typedef` is correctly parsed:
```js
/** 
 * @typedef {{
 *   foo:
 *   *,
 *   bar:
 *   *
 * }} Works
 */
```

And this is not supported:
```js
/** 
   Multiline type expressions in comments without leading * are not supported.
   @typedef {{
     foo:
     *,
     bar:
     *
   }} DoesNotWork
 */
```
